A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I dislike each and every Star Wars movies\, but I saw them all\, and this one is the most stupid I've ever seen. Basically\, this movie explains that everything that happened before was a nonsense. \nFor example\, if a small spaceship in hyperdrive can destroy the shield of a bigger spaceship\, then here you have a solution for destroying the Death Star... So they could have stop this ugly franchise at episode V\, so at least in 1980.
